# MONITORINFO Equality operator

Implement the equality operator (==).

```csharp
public static bool operator ==(MONITORINFO deviceInfo1, MONITORINFO deviceInfo2)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| deviceInfo1 | Operand 1. |
| deviceInfo2 | Operand 2. |

## Return Value

Returns true if `deviceInfo1` is equal to `deviceInfo2`; false otherwise.
